reviewText: I would never by this dvd. These people are sick. There son josh molests His sisters, and his parents keeps his gross secret for him. They are liars, And very judgmental. These people put on a act in front of the camera. This show should be cancelled, and there should not be any dvd sold. Molesting kids iis never right, and him, and his parents should be ashamed of themselves!!

One of the best family shows ever!  Get the family together, put in the Duggars and have a great time watching!  Now if we can just get them to release all of the seasons on DVD or BluRay, my library will be complete!  :)

I watched this show to see what it was like. I found out with the first show. In my opinion, unusual from the get go. All the wives or girl friend look like the mom: long hair, facial features, plain clothes, etc. . Also, isolation from other people. Basically it seems like they live in a bubble. Especially working. No outside jobs. I don't know how this show lasted so long.
This is pure ignorance at it's worst!  If there ever was proof of how dangerous religious fanaticism can be, this is it!
So happy to see more seasons in DVD!! Can you get seasons 6-10 on DVD?
Just what I wanteded.  A great transaction!
I love the Duggars and watching their shows always make me happy.
It was out of order and missing some episodes
Love the shows and all the books written about the family.
